pageTitle: Manual :: The "direct" renderer for 'tree' and 'sitemap' menu types where level is represented by tags nesting.
title: Inherited from HTML_Menu_Renderer
textBeforeTable:
HTML_Menu_DirectTreeRenderer Inherited Methods HTML_Menu_DirectTreeRenderer HTML_Menu_Renderer Class Trees for HTML_Menu_DirectTreeRenderer Idea and initial code contributed by Uwe Mindrup.
  • Menu item 2
  • Menu item 1.2
  • Menu item 1.1
    • Menu item 1
        The renderer is designed to output only the menus of type 'tree' and 'sitemap'. It shows the level of the menu by tags nesting, not by outputting some indentation and is able to output e.g. nested HTML lists: Description 'sitemap' menu types where level is represented by tags nesting.
